series_description: This series documents unemployment compensation (UC) claims filed against Virginia and agent claims filed against state. This series may include, but is not limited to: statements from claimants, hearing officer determinations, summary, payments, verifications, eligibility reviews, requests for reconsideration, and correspondence.

This series documents unemployment insurance tax accounts that have become delinquent due to non-payment of taxes all collection efforts have been unsuccessful. This series may include, but is not limited to: demand notices, memorandums lien, fieri facias, and judgments.

This series documents overpaid claims and investigations of overpayments to claimants who applied for unemployment insurance. This series may include, but is not limited to: report of investigation, overpayment referrals, overpayment bill, of payments, claimant notice of predetermination proceeding, and Benefit Payment Control Correspondence (BPCC).

This series documents employers who meet the insurance tax liability criteria in Virginia. The series may but is not limited to: applications, tax reports, payrolls, tax rate notices, charge statements, wage record corrections, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 8 Years after end of state fiscal year
